title: Monorom Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Western, Asian, Cambodian, Khmer
description: Vegetarian food restaurant at the street corner and is easy to spot. Note that La He Road runs diagonally between National Highway 5 and Psah Nat Market. Big menu with Asian, Chinese, as well western dishes. Has air condition and Wi-Fi. In Jan 2016 re-branded as Monorom Garden; was formerly known as Te Kuch La.A and prior to that Mercy House.
